Hello Folks,
I'm from chennai, india and have been experimenting evp for pa=
st couple of days actively.To my surprise, i can kind of make out the voice=
s in english as well as my native language tamil. I am looking forward to e=
xplore, share and learn more from the experienced folksin the group.=A0
For=
 now, i'm using audacity in mac for recording (at 00 hrs as i've felt the t=
imingperfectly good for silence and concentration). For processing i use so=
undtrack pro withwavearts noise + hum au effects to clean, boost, polish th=
e track.
I'm looking forward for your knowledge and ideas.=A0
P.S: Is it ok=
 to send the mp3 to the group for analysis ?
Thanks,Gan.
